A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was solid. I think everyone will agree that The Last Jedi is flawed\, but they will also agree that there were moments of excellence. The throne room scene with Kylo Ren and Rey comes to mind\, which was a perfectly executed scene which was immensely satisfying to see. While I don't agree with nor particularly like some of the plotting choices made in The Last Jedi\, I can respect the film as it executes these choices incredibly well (for the most part)
